languages.text: "Идира, Трона ради — осторожнее с этим созданием. Мы даже до конца не понимаем, что это такое. И пока не поймем — лучше считай его чем-то вроде опасного ксеноса. Для собственной безопасности".

"Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."
languages.original_text: "Идира, Трона ради — осторожнее с этим созданием. Мы даже до конца не понимаем, что это такое. И пока не поймем — лучше считай его чем-то вроде опасного ксеноса. Для собственной безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “伊迪拉，看在黄金王座的份上，当心那家伙。我们甚至不知道它到底是什么东西。在我们弄清它的本质之前，你最好像对待其他危险异形一样对待它，就当这是为了你自己安全着想。”
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: “伊迪拉，看在黄金王座的份上，当心那家伙。我们甚至不知道它到底是什么东西。在我们弄清它的本质之前，你最好像对待其他危险异形一样对待它，就当这是为了你自己安全着想。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Idira, pour l'amour du Trône, soyez prudente avec cette créature. Nous ne savons pas encore exactement ce qu'elle est, et tant que ce sera le cas, vous devriez la traiter comme tout autre xénos. Pour votre propre sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: « Idira, pour l'amour du Trône, soyez prudente avec cette créature. Nous ne savons pas encore exactement ce qu'elle est, et tant que ce sera le cas, vous devriez la traiter comme tout autre xénos. Pour votre propre sécurité. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Idira, por amor del Trono, cuidado con esa criatura. Ni siquiera entendemos plenamente lo que es. Hasta que lo hagamos, es mejor que lo trate como a cualquier otro xenos peligroso. Por su propio bien».
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: «Idira, por amor del Trono, cuidado con esa criatura. Ni siquiera entendemos plenamente lo que es. Hasta que lo hagamos, es mejor que lo trate como a cualquier otro xenos peligroso. Por su propio bien».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラ、どうかお願いです、あのクリーチャーには気をつけてください。まだあいつのことを完全にわかっていないのです。今は、他の危険な異種族と同じように扱いましょう。あなた自身を守るためです」
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ、どうかお願いです、あのクリーチャーには気をつけてください。まだあいつのことを完全にわかっていないのです。今は、他の危険な異種族と同じように扱いましょう。あなた自身を守るためです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Idira, beim Thron, seid vorsichtig mit dieser Kreatur. Wir wissen nicht einmal genau, was sie überhaupt ist. Bis wir das wissen, solltet Ihr sie so behandeln wie jeden anderen gefährlichen Xenos. Zu Eurer eigenen Sicherheit."
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

traits.locale_text: "Idira, beim Thron, seid vorsichtig mit dieser Kreatur. Wir wissen nicht einmal genau, was sie überhaupt ist. Bis wir das wissen, solltet Ihr sie so behandeln wie jeden anderen gefährlichen Xenos. Zu Eurer eigenen Sicherheit."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."

languages.text: "İdira, Taht aşkına o yaratığa dikkat et. Daha ne olduğunu bile tam olarak anlayamadık. Anlayana kadar herhangi bir tehlikeli zenoya yaklaştığın gibi yaklaşsan iyi edersin. Kendi iyiliğin için."
languages.original_text: "Idira, for Throne's sake, be careful with that creature. We do not even fully understand what it is. Until we do, you would do well to treat it as you would any other dangerous xenos. For your own safety."
